```{r load_package, echo = FALSE, results='hide', warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
devtools::load_all()
```

##Getting Raster Data 

### Crop Layers form USDA

```{r CLD, message = FALSE}
CLD = getCLD(clip_unit = list("University of Alabama", 10, 10), year = 2016)
str(CLD, max = 1)
```

<left>
<a ><img alt = '' width='400' src='img/cld.png' /></a>
</left>

### National Elevation Dataset

```{r NED, message = FALSE}
ned = getNED(clip_unit = list("UCSB", 10, 10))
str(ned, max = 1)
```

<left>
<a ><img alt = '' width='400' src='img/ned.png' /></a>
</left>

### Get National Land Cover Data

```{r NLCD, message=FALSE}
nlcd = getNLCD(clip_unit = list("UCSB", 10, 10))
str(nlcd, max = 1)
```

<left>
<a ><img alt = '' width='400' src='img/nlcd.png' /></a>
</left>

### Get Koppen Classification

```{r Koppen, message=FALSE}
kop = getKoppen(state = "CA", county = c("Santa Barbara", "Ventura", "San Luis Obispo"), boundary = T)
str(kop, max = 1)
```

<left>
<a ><img alt = '' width='800' src='img/kop.png' /></a>
</left>

```{r}
kop$summary
```
